strings.help: Type: add [book name] - to add book edit [book name] - to edit book remove [book name] - to remove book all - to see all books in library exit - to leave program
strings.bookNotFound: book with such name not found
strings.fewBooks: we have few books with such name please choose one by typing a number of book:
strings.emptyLibrary: Library is empty. Type 'help' to see how add book
